title: Fast shipping
text: Fast shipping, quality products. Happy with my purchase

title: Great products
text: Great products, always high quality. Fast shipping that has been on time with stated delivery time. 5 star

title: Liftmode sets the bar with customer…
text: Liftmode sets the bar with customer service and quality of products. I appreciate their transparency with providing lab results. I do and would highly recommend them to anyone who is looking to improve their quality of life.

title: Highly recommended
text: I've used this company for years. All their products are of the highest quality and purity available, often to the degree that you can't find anything comparable elsewhere. And with the lab results to back it up, which is just as uncommon. They always promptly ship their products and they're in my hand within a few days. Great customer service aswell. Can't go wrong.

title: I am absolutely delighted with the…
text: I am absolutely delighted with the products of this brand, they are of exceptional quality and without a doubt the best I have found on the market. I would like to express my sincere admiration for your commitment to excellence and innovation. In particular, I am very satisfied with VisiónLift, but I think there is still room to improve and reach new heights. It would be exciting to see it evolve into an even more advanced formula, like AREDS 2, that sets new standards in the industry. Keep up the excellent work!"

title: Fantastic
text: Fantastic. Package shipped the same day I ordered.Product is the best quality I've had.

title: Great effective product
text: Great effective product! And quick shipping! I've been a customer for almost 10 years and have always been satisfied.

title: Highest purity and quality!!!
text: Very fast shipping for a low fee, I recieved my package 2 days after I clicked the order button. I also love how the bottles are completely sealed with plastic on the outside of bottle, plus the "sealed for your protection" 2 layers of protection give me peace of mind. ALSO the quality inspection sheets that I recieve prove to me that what I am receiving is of the highest purity and quality.

title: Never disappoints!
text: First off let me start with customer service , they are always there to help and answer questions. I love how they send useful tips for health, aging, or mood and fitness. The products never disappoint and it’s reassuring to have the lab results to feel safe when taking these supplements. Thank you Litfmode for what you guys are doing over there.

title: Kava tea and honey samples
text: So I tried the samples for kava cloud tea and sweet kava honey and just wow! Excellent products, tastes very good and u can definitely feel the benefits. If I could give above 5 stars I would. Keep it up yall. Looking forward to trying many of the other products as well.

title: Supplements that are not B.S. and have CoA reports to back it up.
text: Great quality items, it is extremely nice to get a physical Certificate of Analysis with each item, as so many supplement companies claim to have testing done but when you try to retrieve their test data it is nowhere to be found. Shipping is excellent as well.

title: Most trustworthy & potent products
text: all the way products that you make are pure and potent compared to other top brands. better and more bang for your buck and the benefits from baicalm, kanna extract, liver friendly kava honey(great needs flavoring)have helped me so much in my life so far. i can trust you guys and thats the most important thing. thank you! ps i would appreciate little gifts here and there wink wink lol thanks guys

title: Been buying things from them for years
text: Been buying things from them for years. I have always got top quality products from LiftMode. Literally years of purchases of all kinds of things, and not one thing was not to my liking. Great company, great lab.

title: Long Time Customer
text: Liftmode is always a great simple purchasing experience. Where LiftMode stands head and shoulders taller than the competition is the attention to detail. Many companies sell powdered supplements. But most forget to include the quality reports like Liftmode, packaged very thoughtfully and including the various scoops and their measurements. These small details make a big difference. I will continue supporting them as long as they are in business. I love how the still continue to add cutting edge products.

title: Always a great experience
text: Always a great experience with Liftmode. Every order comes with a full panel COA testing for purity and safety. Products are always satisfactory because you know exactly what you're getting without a doubt. I've been a customer for years now and Liftmode has earned my loyalty.

title: Amazing company!
text: Amazing company in all aspects. Every product I’ve received from Liftmode has been stellar quality, reasonably priced, and quickly shipped. There’s a reason I have been a returning customer for so long. Liftmode has never once done me wrong.

title: BEST KAVA HONEY ON THE MARKET!!!
text: I tried the kava amanita honey and it's very relaxing and great for anxiety. Probably the best kava extract product I've ever had. I tried a couple other extracts and another kava honey (that was much more expensive and came with less) and Liftmode's blew it out of the water and didn't cause a hangover the next day (kava's not supposed to but I've had various extracts and another honey that gave me a killer headache the next day) they're now my go to for kava honey. And they're other products are great too! I wasn't a big fan of Kanna ( I believe the quality was good cause it had a very strong effect, I just don't like how it feels) but their magnolia bark is extremely effective for anxiety and sleep as wellThank you Liftmode!

title: I made an error for my shipping address…
text: I made an error for my shipping address and even after my package said it was shipped. Customer service was sure to correct it before it was delivered. Haven’t received my product yet but as soon as I do, I will definitely post another review.

title: Liftmode
text: Liftmodes products work and are extremely affordable compared to other inferior products/brands. I like paying companies that are trustworthy! Some products I like are Baicalm, Kava, mood boost, and ton of the assorted powders like the gotu kola and rhodiola. I have most of those headed my way now! Thanks liftmode

title: Liftmode's L-THP is real stuff
text: Liftmode's L-THP is real stuff. I can assure you it's very potent. Great value and quick delivery as well.I had a problem with my first order where it came with the seal broken. When I brought it up to support, they were quick to respond and send me a replacement which was perfect. Totally recommend.

title: Holy Heck, where have you been all my life?!
text: Ok, first off, I love LiftMode. Or maybe I just have a lot of love to give after taking Phenylethylamine. It’s amazing, like all the powders I’ve gotten. But wow. It came so fast and is so incredibly effective. I’m a writer, so it gets my creative juices flowing without adding edginess or insomnia into the mix. I was shocked at how well it works, honestly. DEFINITELY worth the cost, I’ve tried so many nootropics and this gives the most substantial results with no negative side effects. WOW WOW WOW. You guys rock.

title: I have always received excellent help…
text: I have always received excellent help from your workers and specialists.  I have purchased many of your propitiatory stacks and all of them have worked as advertised.  I am as healthy as I am because I use many of your products, especially your CBD tinctures.  Well done, Liftmode.

title: Another great experience
text: Ordered Baicalm for the first time and I had it in about 2 days. Very quick. The product is awesome! It puts me in a calm state and positive mood, exactly as described. Thanks Liftmode for this wonderful formulation, your products speak for themselves and it’s simply always a pleasure ordering from your company. Solid

title: Excelent Kanna Product, fast delivery
text: Received MT55 as described on the website.  Very high quality, no clumps in the product.  Effects are nice and enjoyable, use with moderation.  Delivered a day earlier than expected.  Totally satisfied with the purchase.

title: Liftmode... Look no further! Quality extracts. Fair prices.
text: I have been ordering from Liftmode for many years now and have always received quality products. The quality of the different extracts and supplements are very important and have always been top notch from Liftmode. The prices are also amazing considering the high quality of their products.

title: Great place for longevity, supplements, immune boosters
text: You have a broad selection of items that I use for my longevity an immune system protocols. You also provide a coa along with the items that you send and they come nicely packaged. Also you have a contact number and you detail the backgrounds of the people who run the organization. Shipping is also ultra fast. I'll be purchasing from you again.

title: My experience has been great
text: My experience has been great. Good customer service always. Have used them for phenibut for the last few years, never had an issue with quality or shipping. Once the website wasnt working and i was able to place an order over the phone. So yeah 5 stars. Pretty disappointed that phenibut will no longer be sold by liftmode.

title: Awesome company!
text: I love how the company is always coming up with new products. Disappointed my favorite Phenibut was taken off the market, but excited for some new products. I also appreciate the emails, letting me know about new products and sales. Thank you ❤️

title: Liftmode has been a great vendor
text: Liftmode has been a great vendor. I wish they still sold their most popular supplement/nootropic but for some reason they have stopped selling it. None the less liftmode was always 100% legit. I shall still use them once in a blue moon for some of their more niche items like magnolol and honikol and other supplements/nootropics. I wish you guys would re-stock the good form of GABA (gamma-butric-....). Why did you guys stop selling it and will you ever re-stock it again?

title: Excellent supplier of supplements
text: I appreciate all of the useful information on all of the various supplements that Liftmode offers. By having a 3rd party lab to test purity, Liftmode offers quality products.All orders I have placed have been on time as promised, and I have never had any issues.To anyone interested in adding a supplement to their daily regimen, make sure to do your homework first, and speak to your doctor to ensure that you won't have any medication interactions or side effects involving any of Liftmode's fine products.

title: Was delivered very quickly
text: Was delivered very quickly. Supplement has helped me in a massive way. Want to shout out Big Lenny for recommending LiftMode and Phenibut! I will be using LiftMode as my go to store for my supplements indefinitely!

title: Fast shipping
text: Fast shipping, great product, just wish it was a bit cheaper but it’s pretty standard market pricing for what it is

text: I would like to start off by I feel really really really bad for requesting a refund and they gave me a refund, I ordered phenibut and I received it! However I firs started off by 2 capsules I felt nothing then after a few days I took 3 felt nothing then took 2 more then took 2 more so its 7 capsules... I still felt nothing I felt upset because I had high hopes for it and this is my first time ever trying phenibut so I dont have any tolerance, I requested a refund and they kindly gave it to me and I feel really bad but idk maybe my body is different or something or It did have an effect and I didnt notice but I dont know I really dont, but the service is really nice and professional, ugh I feel like I should pay them back I feel really bad but overall I really really recommend this brand, I highly suggest you check it out

title: Finally some sleep
text: First off, I went to order the NMN which you were out of.  Understand that as it has received quite a bit of attention NATIONALLY!  But I DID get the sleep caps!  My husband had so many surgeries (6 joint replacements) and the doctors happily got him hooked on oxycodone!  He finally went to rehab about 7/8 years ago.  While getting off wasn't easy, getting sleep after being addicted was IMPOSSIBLE.  We (I) have tried EVERYTHING I could think of!  NOTHING worked.  Well, tried this and he has actually had 4 nights sleep!  Lord willing and the creeks don't rise, I pray that this continues because INSOMNIA is insidious!  It has ruled our lives!  What a journey!  Thank you!

title: I have had pretty much all positive…
text: I have had pretty much all positive experiences with lift mode in particular their Phenibut product. I’m not really sure how Phenibut has anything to do with lifting weights or fitness however it’s wonderful for helping to control anxiety. I was made aware of the product by a man named Leonard Persin. He has a YouTube channel called the (Big Lenny Show) this man is a character for sure but in-between his strange gym persona and his tranny hunting. Yes the man really enjoys ladyboys. But we live in America so it’s his right to hunt down tan ten ten’s as he reference's them. Tan for their skin color Ten for their attractive appearance and Ten because According to him they are packing 10 inches of heat down below the waist. I find this to be an interesting individual but draw the line at enjoying ladyboy company. I Have to give him credit he speaks highly of the Phenibut manufactured by lift-mode and in all honesty we probably would not be privy to phenibut. In all honesty you should make this man a paid spokesperson for your company. I’d look at your phenibut sales and contribute 90% of them to Mr. Persin and his loyal followers.Sincerely,Jeffrey A. title: Worth it.
